column5: Hi Guys,  Was looking over my motor the other day and noticed where the 4 bolts that connect the motor to the shaft housing one of the bolts has what looks to be used or spent exhaust oil. Anyone seen this before and any tips on how to fix it.  Thanks  G
Need some info, like 2s or 4s and some pics would help
Shes a 2 stroke and I will try and get some pics.
normal for a 2 stroke nothing to worry about  it is just exhaust crap oil/exhaust
